alert.note: Alert for Eastern Elko County; Northern Nye County - Mojave; White Pine and Northeast Nye Counties (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 17 at 11:14PM PDT until June 18 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 11 PM PDT SATURDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 425, 426, AND 470... ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 425, 426, AND 470... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 425 White Pine and Northeast Nye Counties, Fire Weather Zone 426 Northern Nye County-Mojave and Fire Weather Zone 470 Eastern Elko County. * Winds...Southwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 5 percent. * Impacts...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity may create critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Elko County; Northern Nye County - Mojave; White Pine and Northeast Nye Counties
